name: Chiroform CAT Palm & Finger Pad Set
descr:
Our new ergonomically designed Palm and Finger Pads add styel and comfort to your Chiroform CAT Activator.

The CAT Palm and Finger Pads can bu used independently or together, depending on the size of your hand.

They are thick enough to offer sufficient cushioning without being bulky and cumbersome.

CAT Palm and Finger Pads are hypo-allergenic and built for maximum comfort.
